node.address: Pie de La Popa, Callejon Mendez 29A # 97 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
Piemont Hotel in Cartagena is strategically located near shopping centers, 10 minutes from the historic center, 5 minutes from San Felipe Castle, 20 minutes from Rafael Nu√±ez Airport, very close to the port of Cartagena and business centers.

We have 8 comfortable and pleasant rooms, which offer good taste interior and a quality rest for our guests. The rooms of Piemont Hotel boutique are designed keeping in mind the comfort, security and tranquillity, equipped with air conditioning, WiFi, TV and security boxes. In Piemont Hotel we have a parking and 24-hour reception service.

Situated in Cartagena de Indias, 1.7 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle, Piemont Hotel Boutique features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The hotel has a sauna, room service and free WiFi.

description.description: In Piemont Hotel Boutique you will enjoy a warm and friendly atmosphere - those are the main characteristics that distinguish us. We offer reasonable prices in order to meet the needs of travellers visiting the city both for tourism and business. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a patio. All rooms at Piemont Hotel Boutique have air conditioning and a wardrobe.
